--- alter_table_add_constraint_check.sql
alter table foo add constraint cname check (c1 > 0)

--- AST
&ast.AlterTable{
  Alter: 0,
  Name:  &ast.Ident{
    NamePos: 12,
    NameEnd: 15,
    Name:    "foo",
  },
  TableAlternation: &ast.AddTableConstraint{
    Add:             16,
    TableConstraint: &ast.TableConstraint{
      ConstraintPos: 20,
      Name:          &ast.Ident{
        NamePos: 31,
        NameEnd: 36,
        Name:    "cname",
      },
      Constraint: &ast.Check{
        Check:  37,
        Rparen: 51,
        Expr:   &ast.BinaryExpr{
          Op:   ">",
          Left: &ast.Ident{
            NamePos: 44,
            NameEnd: 46,
            Name:    "c1",
          },
          Right: &ast.IntLiteral{
            ValuePos: 49,
            ValueEnd: 50,
            Base:     10,
            Value:    "0",
          },
        },
      },
    },
  },
}

--- SQL
ALTER TABLE foo ADD CONSTRAINT cname CHECK (c1 > 0)
